title: Just a story
creator_credit: Diane O'Connor, Tony Paice, Barbara Boyd-Anderson and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: An attempt to show that storytelling is not just part of literature but is part of the everyday world around us and the ways in which we relate to each other. Demonstrates that our own experiences provide a rich source of information which may be drawn upon for the writing of stories.
creator_credit_for_label: Diane O’Connor, Tony Paice, Barbara Boyd-Anderson and Victoria. Ministry of Education
